definition: to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society

sentences.english: Mother needs extra help in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽需要額外的人手幫廚。

sentences.english: I wanna see you help cook.
In London he found a job helping the cook of a rich merchant.
sentences.chinese: 在倫敦，他找到一份工作，爲一個富商的廚師做幫廚。

sentences.english: They insisted on helping us in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 他們堅持要給我們幫廚。
